activities.name: FullLoadOneObject
activities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
TableName,
WatermarkValue
FROM
stg.watermarktable 
WHERE
TableName = 'OnlineBlob'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from dbo.Tickets
where 
TransactionDt > '@{activity('LookupWatermarkOld').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' 
and TransactionDt <= '@{activity('LookupWatermarkNEW').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
TableName,
WatermarkValue
FROM
stg.watermarktable 
WHERE
TableName = 'Tickets'

scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT
     MovieIdNK
     ,Title
     ,ReleaseDate
     ,Runtime
     ,s.MovieStatusName
FROM
     dbo.tmovies m
     JOIN [dbo].[tMovieStatus] s on m.MovieStatusId = s.MovieStatusId',

query: 'SELECT 
     m.MovieIdNK
     ,s.ServiceCode
     ,[Price]
     ,[TransactionId]
     ,FORMAT([TransactionDate], 'yyyyMMdd') as TransactionDate
FROM [dbo].[tOnlinePurchase] p
JOIN dbo.tOnlineService s ON s.ServiceId = p.ServiceId
JOIN dbo.tMovies m ON m.MovieId = p.MovieId',

query: 'SELECT 
     FORMAT([TransactionDate], 'yyyyMM') as MonthKey
     ,m.MovieIdNK
     ,s.ServiceCode
     ,SUM([Price]) PurchaseAmount
     ,COUNT(*) PurchaseQuantity
FROM [dbo].[tOnlinePurchase] p
JOIN dbo.tOnlineService s ON s.ServiceId = p.ServiceId
JOIN dbo.tMovies m ON m.MovieId = p.MovieId
GROUP BY 
     FORMAT([TransactionDate], 'yyyyMM')
     ,m.MovieIdNK
     ,s.ServiceCode',
